Title: Under the Hawthorn Tree
Writer: Ai Mi (novel), Lichuan Yin (screenplay), Xiaobai Gu (screenplay), Mei Ah (screenplay)
Actors: Dongyu Zhou, Shawn Dou, Meijuan Xi, Xuejian Li
Plot: Romance sparks between a young woman and a young man from different economic backgrounds during China's Cultural Revolution of the 1960s and '70s.
